title: Happy Boys
original_name: ハッピィ ★ ボーイズ
sinopse: “Welcome home, mademoiselle!” At the butler café, Lady Braganza, the five apprentice butlers known as the Happy Boys have been waiting for you! It's their mission to bring happiness to the ladies who visit the café and to become the perfect butler. The ladies happiness is their happiness. The topic of late-night television dramas, presented here is an original episode of a butler café coming-of-age story brought to life on the comics page!
